name: Aculite Sensitive
description:
Product details
		



Aculite Sensitive Anti-dandruff shampoo treats & prevents dandruff and its symptoms such as dry, flaky, red, itchy scalp. Aculite anti-dandruff shampoo is dermatalogically tested and fragrance free. It works by treating the underlying cause of dandruff, by restoring your scalp back to its normal healthy state.Dermatalogically tested.Fragrance free.For a healthier scalp.




Suitable for
Adults and adolescents over 12 years.


 
Age RestrictionYou must be at least 16 years old to purchase this product.


How to use
Please read the enclosed leaflet carefully before use.DirectionsWet hair thoroughly.Apply a small amount of Aculite Sensitive Anti-Dandruff Shampoo to your scalp and massage into a lather For best results, leave on your scalp for 3 - 5 minutesRinse thoroughly. For the first 2 to 4 weeks: use every 3 or 4 days to clear dandruff. Thereafter: use once every 1 or 2 weeks to prevent dandruff from coming back. If your scalp has not cleared after 4 weeks, you may not have dandruff and should seek further advice from your pharmacist or doctor. For use in adults and adolescents over 12 years.Do not use more often than directed. Please read the enclosed leaflet, it will give you more information. Shake the bottle. For External Use Only.


Hazards and Cautions
Keep out of the reach and sight of children.

Do not use more often than directed.
Please read the enclosed leaflet, it will give you more information. Shake the bottle.

FOR EXTERNAL USE.

Storage

Store below 25oC


Precautions


This is a medicine; Consult your doctor or pharmacist if you have an underlying medical condition, are taking any other medication or complementary therapy, or if symptoms persist.

Seek advice before using if you are breast feeding, pregnant, planning to become pregnant, or suffer from allergies.

Keep all medicines out of the reach of children.





Active ingredients
Ketoconazole


Ingredients
Sodium lauryl ether sulfate, Disodium monolauryl ether sulphosuccinate, Coconut fatty acid diethanolamide, Laurdimonium hydrolysed animal collagen, Macrogol 120 methyl glucose dioleate, Sodium chloride, Concentrated hydrochloric acid, Imidurea, Sodium hydroxide, Erythrosine sodium (E127), Purified water

Bentoley Anti-Dandruff Shampoo is a fragranced medicated shampoo, which should be used as often as two or three times a week, for the treatment of itchy, flaky scalp disorders such as dandruff, seborrhoeic dermatitis and scalp psoriasis.  Regular use helps control these problems, while leaving your hair shiny and manageable.Effective treatment for:Scalp PsoriasisSeborrhoeic Dermatitis (dry, itching scalp)DandruffTreats your scalp, cares for your hair




Suitable for
Adults and children 12 years and over


 
Age restrictionYou must be at least 16 years old to purchase this product


How to use

This means it should only be used to treat the skin an your scalp.Avoid contact with eyesDo not use on inflamed or broken skinThe  shampoo should be applied as detailed below. You should then look at the dosing table to find out how often you can use the shampoo.1. Wet hair thoroughly2. Apply liberal amounts of shampoo and massage into the scalp to form a rich lather3. Leave the lather one the scalp for several minutes4. Rinse and repeat the application once more5. Rinse thoroughlyShould not be used children under 12 years of ageAge and DoseAdults and children aged 12 years and over - Apply shampoo as described anoved two to three times a weekTreatment should last about 6 weeks. Before using this shampooThis product is suitable for most people. At Aveeno, we understand that a healthy scalp is the foundation for beautiful hair.
Made with colloidal oats, known for their skin moisturising properties, and botanical ingredients, Aveeno Clarify & Shine+ Apple Cider Vinegar Shampoo gently clarifies hair congested from product build-up and enhances shine while soothing the scalp. Hair is left hydrated, healthy looking and with a natural, glossy shine wash after wash. 
Created with both hair and scalp in mind, Aveeno haircare is clinically proven to help relieve itchy, dry scalps and reduce flakes without stripping hair of its natural oils, leaving it looking and feeling soft, shiny and healthy.
 
• For all hair types in need of a cleanse
• Gentle enough for daily use
• Clinically proven to relieve itchy scalp
• pH balanced formula
• Suitable for sensitive skin
• Sulfate-free surfactants 

For best results, use with Aveeno Apple Cider Vinegar Conditioner.

Our effort for the planet:
Bottle made from 50% recycled plastic. Recyclable bottle & cap (check local sorting instructions). 




How to use
Apply shampoo generously to wet hair, massage into a lather through to ends, then rinse hair thoroughly. After shampooing, follow with Aveeno Clarify and Shine+ Apple Cider Vinegar Conditioner for best results.



Hazards and Cautions
Warning: Use only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately. Keep away from children. For best results, use in conjunction with other Aveeno hair products.

Product details
		



L'Oréal Elvive Colour Protect Shampoo 400ml

Colourants can alter the natural protective layer of the hair, making the fibre more sensitive to external aggressions such as sun and pollution. To help protect your hair, a specific protective care is needed. L'Oréal Paris has created Elvive Colour Protect, the UK's no. 1 for coloured hair*.

The secret to colour protection
1 Concentrated Nourishment
The formula, enriched with an Active Nourishing Ingredient, bathes the hair and transforms its surface. Hair feels voluptuous to the touch.
2 Lasting Colour Protection
Enriched with UVA + UVB Filters, the formula helps protect hair from external aggressions and leaves colour shimmering.

Proven results
Just coloured intensity for up to 7 weeks**

*Nielsen shampoo and conditioner unit sales Jan 2017 - Dec 2017
**Instrumental test after application of shampoo + conditioner.

Key Features:

• Larger format
• Concentrated nourishment + UVA/UVB Filters
• Protects hair
• Prolongs colour"




How to use
Work through the lengths of your hair, right to the tips, and then rinse. For best results use after Colour Protect Shampoo and for even more care and protection, try Colour Protect Masque.



Hazards and Cautions
 In case of contact with eyes, rinse them immediately.

L'Oreal Elvive Clay Oily Roots Shampoo 400ml

The Science of Oily Roots and Dry Ends.

Oil produced from the scalp can build up causing the roots to become visibly greasy, weighing down the hair. Over-washing to combat this problem can strip the fiber leaving it dry. This results in a vicious cycle of washing. What if you could have hair that was cared for at both ends?

The Secret of Clay for 72 Hours of Pure Roots and Hydrated Ends.

For the first time, L'Oréal Paris Laboratories have combined 3 Refined Clays to create its first re-balancing range revealing perfectly balanced, beautiful hair.
 

Scalp feels deeply purified for 72 hours with freshness and light, lifted root.
Dry hair feels hydrated right to the ends for fluid, free-flowing lengths.
Revitalises the hair with softness, shine and bounce.    
A delicate Clay texture for hair purity, hydration and beauty.


	 

Proven Results:

Visibly clears dandruff for intensely purified roots, hydrated feeling ends.Perfectly balanced, beautiful hair.

name: Climatise Jungle
description:
Product details
		



There’s something about strong, full-looking hair that lets you take on the day with confidence. You can now get that style without having to go to a salon with Tresemme Beauty-Full Strength Shampoo, designed to leave your hair looking fuller and feeling fortified. Featuring ProPlex Fortifiant, this professional-quality shampoo for damaged hair penetrates inside the hair fibre to reinforce its structure from within, resulting in up to 99% less hair on your brush. What’s more, its fortifying formula uses our PRO Style Technology with amino acids and ceramides to leave your hair strong and manageable with continuous use. For naturally fuller-looking hair that feels reinforced, start your routine by applying a generous amount of Tresemme Beauty-Full Strength Shampoo to wet hair. Gently massage the scalp with your fingertips to work into a lather, then rinse thoroughly. Follow with Beauty-Full Strength Conditioner and style with your favourite Tresemme styling products as needed. At Tresemme, we’ve always understood that style is more than a look: it’s a part of you. With our professional-quality care, a world of style possibilities is yours to achieve. Every choice we make at Tresemme, from the values we promote – such as not testing on animals and being PETA approved – to the stylists we work with, down to the carefully selected ingredients we use, are made with intention and inspired by the latest trends and style. Because 70 years on, we believe in the power of style. So tell your story, land that job, make your mark – and achieve your aspirations with confidence. With Tresemme, your style can match your ambition.

Key features:

• Tresemme Beauty-Full Strength Shampoo gives you naturally fuller-looking hair that feels reinforced
• Our fortifying shampoo features PRO Style Technology which works from the inside out to leave hair strong and manageable with continued use
• Formulated with ProPlex Fortifiant, this shampoo for damaged hair strengthens and reinforces hair fibres for up to 99% less hair on your brush
• Our hair care experts are at the forefront of science and safety – every ingredient is carefully selected to ensure your hair receives the best possible care
• Apply Beauty-Full Strength Shampoo from roots to ends, lather gently while massaging into the scalp before rinsing thoroughly and following with Beauty-Full Strength Conditioner to maximise results
• With Tresemme professional hair care products, you can create your personal style to achieve your aspirations with confidence




Ingredients
Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Glycerin, Gluconolactone, Citric Acid, Sodium Sulfate, Trehalose, Disodium EDTA, Polyquaternium-10, Arginine, Lysine HCl, Ceramide NG, PPG-6, Sodium Hydroxide, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

Because 70 years on, we believe in the power of style. So tell your story, land that job, make your mark – and achieve your aspirations with confidence. How to use
How to use
1 Shake well. Hold can at arm's length
2 massage in to roots

Hazards and Cautions
DANGER: Extremely flammable aerosol. Keep away from heat/sparks/open flames/hot surfaces – No smoking. Do not spray on open flame or other ignition sources. Pressurised container. May burst if heated. Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50°C / 122°F. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating or inhaling the contents can be harmful or fatal. Do not apply to broken or irritated skin. Not for intimate hygiene use. Avoid spraying in eyes. Discontinue use if skin / scalp irritation occurs. Seek medical attention if irritation persists. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN.

Because 70 years on, we believe in the power of style. So tell your story, land that job, make your mark — and achieve your aspirations with confidence. With Tresemme, your style can match your ambition.

name: Earth Tones Intense
description:
Product details
		



SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo gently cleanses hair and skin of impurities while infusing hair with ultra-nourishing moisture. It's designed for those who regularly colour, straighten, perm or heat style their hair, as well as kinky, curly or wavy natural styles.
 
The Jamaican Black Castor Oil and Fair-Trade Shea Butter from Ghana are natural and effective ingredients that deliver intense moisturisation and nourishment. Peppermint Oil helps invigorate the scalp for a tingling experience.
 
For best results, use Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore shampoo and conditioner together to restore damaged or chemically processed hair by strengthening it against breakage and the resultant shedding.
 
How to use? Apply to wet hair, gently massage from roots to ends. Rinse thoroughly. Repeat if necessary. This sulphate free shampoo contains NO nasties such as silicones, parabens, phthalates or mineral oils.
 
SheaMoisture products are powered by sustainably sourced, trusted ingredients and have been tested on friends and family for generations, but never on animals. Try other hair products from the range: Conditioner, Leave-In Conditioner and Treatment Mask to give your beautiful hair care it deserves.
 
SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker, a pioneering mother of four and an entrepreneur, who sold Shea Butter, African Black Soap and home-made beauty preparations in Sierra Leone in 1912. We honour her vision by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa. Every purchase of SheaMoisture products powers the Community Commerce model that invests in our communities.
 
Key features:

SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Shampoo is a sulphate free shampoo that cleanses hair and delivers intense moisturisation and nourishment
This clarifying shampoo removes buildup, while nourishing hair with ultra- moisturising and nutrient-rich Jamaican Black Castor Oil, Fair Trade Shea Butter and stimulating Peppermint
SheaMoisture has delivered the perfect shampoo for those who regularly colour, straighten, perm or heat style their hair, as well as kinky or wavy natural styles
Used together with Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Conditioner, damaged hair is infused with nourishing moisture and the scalp is invigorated with tingling peppermint
All SheaMoisture hair care products are ethically traded, sustainably produced and cruelty-free and with every purchase, you show support of our mission to reinvest in our communities

name: Intents Out of Bed
description:
Product details
		



There’s something about thoroughly cleansed and hydrated hair that lets you take on the day with confidence. You can now get that style without having to visit a salon with Tresemme Replenish & Cleanse Shampoo and Conditioner system. Enriched with a vitamin complex that includes vitamins B3, B5, B7, C and E, Tresemme Replenish & Cleanse Shampoo for greasy hair is designed to gently purify and cleanse your hair and scalp with every wash. Its replenishing formula uses our PRO Style Technology, with amino acids and ceramides, to leave your hair strong and manageable with continuous use. To create the perfect canvas for any hairstyle, start your routine by applying a generous amount of Tresemme Replenish & Cleanse Shampoo to wet hair. Gently massage the scalp with your fingertips to work into a lather, then rinse thoroughly. Follow with Replenish & Cleanse Conditioner and style with your favourite Tresemme styling products as needed.
 
At Tresemme, we’ve always understood that style is more than a look: it’s a part of you. With our professional-quality care, a world of style possibilities is yours to achieve. Every choice we make at Tresemme, from the values we promote – such as not testing on animals and being PETA approved – to the stylists we work with, down to the carefully selected ingredients we use, are made with intention and inspired by the latest trends and style. Because 70 years on, we believe in the power of style. So tell your story, land that job, make your mark – and achieve your aspirations with confidence. With Tresemme, your style can match your ambition.

 
Key features:

• Tresemme Replenish & Cleanse Shampoo and Conditioner system gently purifies and cleanses hair, leaving it refreshed and revived
• Enriched with a vitamin complex, this professional-quality clarifying shampoo deeply cleanses and purifies hair in 1 wash, giving it that fresh, just-left-the-salon feeling
• Tresemme Replenish & Cleanse Shampoo for greasy hair features PRO Style Technology which works from the inside out to leave hair strong and manageable with continued use
• Our hair care experts are at the forefront of science and safety – every ingredient is carefully selected to ensure your hair receives the best possible care
• Apply Tresemme Replenish & Cleanse Shampoo from roots to ends, massage the scalp to lather gently, and then rinse thoroughly; follow with Replenish & Cleanse Conditioner to maximise results
• With Tresemme professional hair care products, you can create your personal style to achieve your aspirations with confidence

Freshly bleached hair looks bright and beautiful, but over time it can go brassy, leaving you with unwanted yellow tones that alter your blonde. Take control of your blonde and own your tone with the Lee Stafford Bleach Blondes Purple Toning Shampoo. A crucial colour corrector for bleached to natural blondes, this powerful purple toning shampoo contains violet pigment to knock out pesky yellow tones and brassiness to keep your hair looking bright, vibrant and salon fresh. 
Purple sits directly opposite yellow on the colour wheel. This means the purple pigment within our violet formulations helps to knock out unwanted brassiness, for a more balanced blonde. Use this shampoo whenever hair looks overly warm for a speedy colour refresh. 
A nourishing formula with Pro-Vitamin B5, Chamomile and Moringa Seed Extract (also known as the  'miracle tree') to encourage natural shine. Formulated specifically for bleached, balayaged, naturally light blonde or highlighted hair, you can team this shampoo with the Lee Stafford Purple Toning Conditioner for double the toning power, or use with the Everyday Care Conditioner for salon fresh blonde.

Nourishing and conditioning stressed, damaged hair.

name: Intents Volumise
description:
Product details
		



Your hair, skin and particularly your scalp can take a beating from daily shampooing, making it vital to find a hair care product that cleanses gently, yet thoroughly. Simple Kind To Hair Gentle Care Shampoo is all that and more. Formulated with the perfect blend of ingredients, it not only cleanses and revives hair, but it is also suitable for daily use by people with sensitive scalps.
 
It will leave your hair healthy while bringing out its natural shine. Infused with moisture-loving pro-vitamin B5 and containing hair-loving ingredients such as chamomile oil and glycerin, our gently cleansing shampoo will restore and replenish your hair’s natural shine. Of course, it only contains Simple goodness and has no harsh chemicals that can upset your hair and scalp, as well as no artificial colour or perfume and no animal-derived ingredients.
 
Being dermatologically tested and approved, this gentle hair shampoo is tailor-made to use every day, even by those with sensitive skin. For best results: Lather up every day by gently massaging into hair scalp. Rinse thoroughly and repeat as necessary. Follow up with our Gentle Care Conditioner. Avoid contact with eyes; if contact occurs, rinse with water. For gentle cleansing you can trust, leave it to the sensitive skin experts. Smile, it's Simple.
 
Key Features:

Simple Kind To Hair Gentle Care Shampoo has the perfect blend of ingredients to help cleanse and revive hair
The kind to skin formula of this shampoo gently yet thoroughly cleanses, making it perfect even for sensitive scalps
Our gentle, cleansing shampoo is infused with pro-vitamin B5 to help ensure healthy, shiny hair
Formulated with hair-loving ingredients such as chamomile oil and glycerin, this gently cleansing shampoo is ideal for daily use
Our kind to skin shampoo contains no harsh chemicals that can upset your hair and scalp, no artificial colour or perfume and no animal-derived ingredients
As with all Simple skin care products, this hair care shampoo is dermatologically tested and approved





How to use
Lather up shampoo by gently massaging into wet hair and scalp. Rinse thoroughly and repeat as necessary. Follow with our Gentle Care Conditioner.


Hazards and Cautions
For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes.


Ingredients

Safe for daily use

This professional hair thickening treatment set for coloured hair contains three products designed to volumise and strengthen hair with light thinning. Nioxin’s 3-part System 3 reduces hair loss due to breakage, while cleaning and refreshing the scalp. This treatment leaves hair thicker, denser-looking and with a vibrant colour. Nioxin Cleanser Shampoo 3 (150ml): removes sebum and environmental residues from the scalp and hair. Nioxin Scalp Therapy Revitalising Conditioner 3 (150ml): a lightweight conditioner that helps provide hair resilience and control moisture balance. Nioxin Scalp & Hair Treatment 3 (50ml): refreshes the scalp and increases hair volume.




How to use
Cleanser: Gently massage a small amount into hair and scalp. Rinse well.
Scalp Therapy Revitalising Conditioner: Apply to scalp and through to mid-lengths and ends. Leave-in for 1 to 3 minutes. Rinse. Scalp & Hair Treatment: Shake well. Apply 5 - 10 pumps evenly to entire scalp and massage. Do not rinse.  We recommend using your 3-Step System a minimum of 3 times a week, for optimal results use daily.


Hazards and Cautions
Treatment CAUTION: May cause temporary redness.

name: James Lister Re-Mould
description:
Product details
		



Working with thick, curly hair that’s all too often dry or has split ends that make hair strands weaker?
 
SheaMoisture Coconut & Hibiscus Curl & Shine Shampoo creates a rich, creamy lather that gently washes away impurities and improves hair health, leaving you with vibrant, bouncy, and unbelievably manageable curls. It’s loaded with everything you need to tame your wavy, curly or kinky, coily hair.
 
The nutrient-rich Coconut Oil and Fair-Trade Shea Butter from Ghana are natural and effective ingredients that moisturise and protect hair while replenishing lost oils. Rosemary Oil and Aloe Vera provide even more hydration while Hibiscus Flower Extract improves hair elasticity, reducing breakage and split ends. Silk Protein smooth hair leaving it silky-soft while Neem Oil controls frizz and gives your curls a brilliant shine.
 
For best results, use the Coconut & Hibiscus Curl & Shine Shampoo and conditioner together to achieve naturally fragrant, frizz-free, healthy-looking curls.
 
HOW TO USE: Apply to wet hair, gently massage from roots to ends. Rinse thoroughly. Repeat if necessary. This sulphate free shampoo contains NO nasties such as silicones, parabens, phthalates or mineral oils.
 
SheaMoisture products are powered by sustainably sourced, trusted ingredients and have been tested on friends and family for generations, but never on animals.
 
SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker, a pioneering mother of four and an entrepreneur, who sold Shea Butter, African Black Soap and homemade beauty preparations in Sierra Leone in 1912.
 
We honour her vision by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa. Every purchase of SheaMoisture products powers the Community Commerce model that invests in our communities.
 
Key features:

SheaMoisture Coconut & Hibiscus Curl & Shine Shampoo is a sulphate free shampoo that gently cleanses dry, delicate curls and improves hair health, restoring its lustrous shine
This curl-enhancing shampoo nourishes hair with fast-absorbing and nutrient-rich Coconut and Neem Oils, Fair Trade Shea Butter, and smoothing Silk Protein
SheaMoisture has delivered the perfect shampoo for thick hair that’s dry or susceptible to split ends, as well as for wavy, curly or kinky, coily hair
Use together with Coconut & Hibiscus Curl & Shine Conditioner to leave your hair vibrant, bouncy, frizz-free and healthy-looking
All SheaMoisture hair care products are ethically traded, sustainably produced and cruelty-free and with every purchase, you show support of our mission to reinvest in our communities
SheaMoisture products, like this nourishing shampoo for curly hair, contain only natural goodness: NO sulphates or silicones





How to use
Apply to wet hair, gently massage and work into a rich lather. Rinse thoroughly. For best results pair with our CURL & SHINE CONDITIONER.


Ingredients
Aqua, Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Glycol Stearate, Parfum, Glyceryl Caprylate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter* **, Panthenol, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Sodium Cocoyl Hydrolyzed Silk, Citric Acid, Stearamide AMP, Melia Azadirachta (Neem) Seed Oil, Sodium Phytate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Tocopherol, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Sodium Benzoate, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Benzyl Benzoate, Coumarin, Limonene. Ingredients correct at time of publication. Always check the packaging for latest ingredient list.

name: James Lister Texturise
description:
Product details
		




Freshly bleached hair looks bright and beautiful but can discolour and go warm and brassy over time. Take control of your blonde and cool down your colour. Refresh your blonde with the Lee Stafford Bleach Blondes Ice White Toning Shampoo. This indigo-blue shampoo is a crucial colour corrector, created to cool down your tone and neutralise orange tones and brassiness in blonde hair.

Blue sits directly opposite orange on the colour wheel. This means the blue pigment within our indigo formulations helps to knock out unwanted brassiness, for a cool, arctic blonde. Use this shampoo whenever hair looks overly warm for a speedy colour refresh. 

This nourishing formulation with Pro-Vitamin B5, Chamomile and Moringa Seed Extract (aka Miracle Tree) encourages natural shine. Formulated specifically for bleach blondes with naturally dark blonde hair, you can team this shampoo with the Lee Stafford Ice White Toning Conditioner for double the toning power, or use with the Everyday Care Conditioner for salon fresh blonde. 





Suitable for
Not suitable for children 



How to use
Massage evenly on wet hair. Leave on for 1-5 minutes depending on desired toning results.

Hazards and Cautions
DANGER. EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE AEROSOL. Pressurised container: may burst if heated. Keep away from heat, hot surfaces, sparks, open flames and other ignition sources. No smoking. Do not spray on an open flame or other ignition source. Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50°C/122°F. Keep out of reach of children. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal. Avoid spraying towards the eyes, or on damaged or inflamed skin.

At Tresemme, we’ve always understood that style is more than a look: it’s a part of you. With our professional-quality care, a world of style possibilities is yours to achieve. name: Maria Carmen Strawberry
description:
Product details
		



Bleaching, chemical styling, colour treatments and rigorous heat styling are all extremely harsh on hair, severely damaging it both inside and out over time.
 
Take the first step to heal the visible signs of severe hair damage with silicone-free Nexxus KERAPHIX Shampoo.
 
At Nexxus, we understand that different hair types have different needs. Hair is made up of around 90% proteins, which is why we use advanced scientific methods to identify the protein needs of each hair type. We create customised formulas with proteins to bring your hair back to life.
 
KERAPHIX Shampoo features our exclusive PROTEINFUSION blend, incorporating hair-strengthening keratin protein and black rice rich in glutamic acid, which is the key amino acid that hair protein loses when it's severely damaged.
 
Its unique formulation cleanses severely damaged hair and primes it for deeper treatment. Thanks to using precise proteins and ingredients from nature, this salon-crafted shampoo for damaged hair provides exactly what's required in order for hair to look and feel its best. It's more than a science. It's an art.
 
Key features

With our exclusive PROTEINFUSION blend, Nexxus KERAPHIX Shampoo cleanses severely damaged hair and primes it for deeper treatment
This salon-quality shampoo gently cleanses and penetrates the hair fibre of damaged hair, starting the hair repair process
Hair shampoo infused with an exclusive blend of strengthening keratin protein and black rice (a rich source of glutamic acid)
Silicone-free keratin shampoo prepares hair for deep conditioning
Use this shampoo for damaged hair as part of a healing ritual that is clinically proven to deliver healthier-looking hair in one use
Continued use with Nexxus KERAPHIX Conditioner enables restorative agents to increase the resilience of hair’s cortex





How to use
Apply to wet hair. Lather. Rinse. Avoid contact with eyes. In case of contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly with water. Follow with Nexxus KERAPHIX Conditioner to increase hair's resilience and leave you with silky, luminous hair.



Ingredients
Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Collagen Amino Acids, Glycol Distearate, Hydrolyzed Elastin, Polyquaternium-10, PEG-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum, Gluconolactone, Citric Acid, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Trehalose, Sodium Sulfate, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Disodium EDTA, PEG-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, Ethylhexylglycerin, PPG-2 Hydroxyethyl Cocamide, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Acetate, Oryza Sativa Extract, PEG-150 Distearate, Sodium Hydroxide, Coumarin, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal.

name: Maria Carmen Zesty
description:
Product details
		



Blow-drying, heat-styling and repeated washing can cause coloured hair to fade and lose its vibrancy. You can now enjoy your vibrant hair colour for longer with Tresemme Revitalise Colour Shampoo. Formulated with hibiscus essence and a UV filter, this professional-quality shampoo is designed to infuse your hair with moisture and provide it with up to 12 weeks of colour vibrancy*. Its gentle cleansing formula uses our PRO Style Technology with amino acids and ceramide to leave your hair strong and manageable with continuous use. To give your hair a nourished and healthy-looking shine, start your routine by applying a generous amount of Tresemme Revitalise Colour Shampoo to wet hair. Gently massage the scalp with your fingertips to work into a lather, then rinse thoroughly. Follow with Revitalise Colour Conditioner, and style with your favourite Tresemme styling products as needed. At Tresemme, we’ve always understood that style is more than a look: it’s a part of you.
 
With our professional-quality care, a world of style possibilities is yours to achieve. Every choice we make at Tresemme, from the values we promote – such as not testing on animals and being PETA approved – to the stylists we work with, right down to the carefully selected ingredients we use, are made with intention and inspired by the latest trends and style. Because 70 years on, we believe in the power of style. So tell your story, land that job, make your mark – and achieve your aspirations with confidence. With Tresemme, your style can match your ambition. *Using Tresemme Revitalise Colour Shampoo and Conditioner vs. a non-conditioning shampoo
 
Key features:
• Tresemme Revitalise Colour Shampoo gently cleanses and replenishes moisture to colour-treated hair while maintaining its shine
• Formulated with hibiscus essence and a UV filter, Tresemme Revitalise Colour Shampoo and Conditioner system for coloured hair helps keep hair looking vibrant for up to 12 weeks*
• This professional-quality shampoo features PRO Style Technology which works from the inside out to leave hair strong and manageable with continued use
• Our hair care experts are at the forefront of science and safety – every ingredient is carefully selected to ensure your hair receives the best possible care
• Apply Tresemme Revitalise Colour Shampoo from roots to ends, lather gently while massaging the scalp, and rinse thoroughly; follow with Revitalise Colour Conditioner to maximise results
• With Tresemme professional hair care products, you can create your personal style to achieve your aspirations with confidence

name: Mateo Re-Style
description:
Product details
		



Naturally Refreshed Hair with 100% natural green tea & chamomile extracts and a light scent!
Harness the power of mother nature with this plant-powered dry shampoo. Give hair a spritz between washes to gently remove excess oil and instantly restore movement. And the bonus? This can uses 40%* less packaging, meaning that you lower your environmental impact and look fabulous doing it.





How to use
FEEL FABULOUS IN 4
1 Shake for a few seconds to wake the magic
2 Section hair and spray towards your roots (from 30cm to be exact)
3 Tumble around with your fingertips and add a little head massage to ensure roots are covered
4. Brush lightly to remove excess residue. You’re ready for the world



Hazards and Cautions
CAUTION: Use in a well-ventilated space and avoid direct inhalation. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating or inhaling the contents can be harmful or fatal. Avoid spraying in eyes. Do not apply to broken or irritated skin. Discontinue use if skin / scalp rash or irritation occurs. Seek medical attention if skin / scalp rash or irritation persists. Use only as directed. Not for intimate hygiene use.
DANGER: Extremely flammable aerosol. Pressurised container: May burst if heated. Keep away from heat, hot surfaces, sparks, open flames and other ignition sources. No smoking. Do not spray on an open flame or other ignition source. Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50°C / 122°F. 
KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN



Important info

0% dyes & sulphates 
Vegan Friendly
Invisible Finish
Natural Cleaning Power
Delicate Scent 
No Water Needed 
Natural Extracts
Recyclable Pack 




Ingredients
Butane, Isobutane, Propane, Alcohol Denat., Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Parfum (Fragrance), Cetrimonium Chloride, Distearyldimonium Chloride, Glycerin, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Citronellol, Limonene.

name: Pintrue Jungle
description:
Product details
		



Naturally Refreshed Hair with 100% natural coconut milk & hemp extracts. Helps calm flyaways and frizz.
Harness the power of mother nature with this plant-powered dry shampoo. Give hair a spritz between washes to gently remove excess oil and instantly restore movement, using 100% natural extracts. And the bonus? This can uses 40%* less packaging, meaning that you lower your environmental impact and look fabulous doing it.





How to use
FEEL FABULOUS IN 4
1 Shake for a few seconds to wake the magic
2 Section hair and spray towards your roots (from 30cm to be exact)
3 Tumble around with your fingertips and add a little head massage to ensure roots are covered
4. Brush lightly to remove excess residue. You’re ready for the world



Hazards and Cautions
CAUTION: Use in a well-ventilated space and avoid direct inhalation. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating or inhaling the contents can be harmful or fatal. Avoid spraying in eyes. Do not apply to broken or irritated skin. Discontinue use if skin / scalp rash or irritation occurs. Seek medical attention if skin / scalp rash or irritation persists. Use only as directed. Not for intimate hygiene use.
DANGER: Extremely flammable aerosol. Pressurised container: May burst if heated. Keep away from heat, hot surfaces, sparks, open flames and other ignition sources. No smoking. Do not spray on an open flame or other ignition source. Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50°C / 122°F. 
KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN



Important info

0% dyes & sulphates
Vegan Friendly
Invisible Finish 
Natural Cleaning Power
Delicate Scent
No Water Needed 
Natural Extracts
Recyclable Pack

name: Pintrue Sensitive
description:
Product details
		



Are you looking for a hair treatment for extremely dry, brittle hair prone to breaking?
 
Try our Manuka Honey & Yoghurt Hydrate & Repair hair products. SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Yoghurt Hydrate & Repair Shampoo for curly hair gently cleanses hair and skin of impurities, preparing it for our Hydrate & Repair Conditioner that repairs heat styled hair by reducing breakage up to 76%*.
 
Dry, brittle strands are moisturised from root to tip leaving hair more resilient and shiny. This shampoo contains Manuka Honey, Yoghurt Extract and Mafura and Baobab Oils. The Fair-Trade Shea Butter from Ghana is a natural and effective ingredient that delivers intense moisturisation and nourishment.
 
This sulphate free shampoo contains NO nasties such as silicones, parabens, phthalates or mineral oils. SheaMoisture products are powered by sustainably sourced, trusted ingredients and have been tested on friends and family for generations, but never on animals.
 
SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker, a pioneering mother of four and an entrepreneur, who sold Shea Butter, African Black Soap and homemade beauty preparations in Sierra Leone in 1912. We honour her vision by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa. Every purchase of SheaMoisture products powers the Community Commerce model that invests in our communities. *up to 76%, tested on non-chemically treated hair.
 
Key features:

SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Yoghurt Hydrate & Repair Shampoo gently cleanses extremely dry and brittle curly hair and repairs by reducing breakage on heat-styled hair when used with Conditioner*
This sulphate free shampoo for dry hair is powered with a super blend of Fair Trade Shea Butter, Manuka Honey, Yoghurt Extract and Mafura and Baobab Oils
SheaMoisture delivers the perfect Hydrate & Repair range for curly hair: shampoo, rinse-off and leave-in conditioners and protein treatment hair mask
Sheamoisture Hydrate & Repair shampoo and conditioner replenish moisture to strengthen hair strands from root to tip leaving hair with a healthy shine and more resilience
All SheaMoisture hair care products are ethically traded, sustainably produced and cruelty-free and with every purchase, you show support of our mission to reinvest in our communities
SheaMoisture products, like this cleansing shampoo for dry hair, contain only natural goodness: NO sulphates or silicones





How to use
Apply to wet hair and gently massage into a rich lather. Rinse thoroughly. Repeat if necessary. For best results, follow with SheaMoisture Hydrate + Recover Conditioner.



Ingredients
Aqua, Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycol Distearate, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter* **, Mel (Honey), Yogurt Powder, Yogurt Extract, Inulin (Chicory Root), Adansonia Digitata (Baobab) Seed Oil, Trichilia Emetica (Mafura) Seed Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Panthenol, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Caprylyl Glycol, Mica, Cl 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Sodium Chloride, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum, Citric Acid, Centrimonium Chloride, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Tetrasodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, Benzyl Benzoate, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal. name: Satsun Moisturise
description:
Product details
		



LIMITED EDITION - SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY

Globally, Dove does not test on animals. We have joined forces with PETA to create a Limited-Edition pack design, available on some of our bestselling products, that celebrates our joint commitment to help bring an end to animal testing. Through our efforts we aim to raise awareness of our support for a global ban on animal testing for cosmetics and invite others to join us.

Our hair gets stressed out and damaged over time, and can easily start to look dull. Dove Nutritive Solutions Intensive Repair Shampoo helps to treat the appearance of damaged hair so that it looks healthy and more beautiful, while restoring your hair's strength to make it more resilient to breakage in the long run. Dove Nutritive Solutions Intensive Repair Shampoo has a unique formula with Nutri-Keratin Repair Actives that help to visibly repair signs of surface damage and progressively nourish damaged hair. With continuous use, this shampoo for damaged hair nourishes the core of your hair to reconstruct it from within, giving it a sleek look. By helping to reinforce your hair against breakage, it can also prevent the appearance of split ends and damage caused by colouring and heat styling.

How to use: Simply apply this Dove shampoo to wet hair and gently massage into a lather. It rinses away cleanly, revealing healthy hair that feels stronger. Suitable for daily use. To keep that damage repair going, make sure you use a hair conditioner that works with your shampoo to increase your hair’s strength. Dove Intensive Repair Conditioner will help to prevent breakages, and leave your hair looking and feeling instantly nourished and beautiful. Globally, Dove does not test on animals.

For the last 30 years, Dove has used alternative non-animal methods to test the safety of its products. PETA certified as Cruelty-Free, Dove products carry PETA’s Beauty Without Bunnies logo for added peace of mind.

Important Information:


Dove Nutritive Solutions Intensive Repair Shampoo nourishes to repair the appearance of damaged hair, Globally, Dove does not test on animals and we have joined forces with PETA to create a Limited-Edition pack design that celebrates our joint commitment to help bring an end to animal testing.
Dove Intensive Repair Shampoo was designed to repair and progressively nourish your hair, and to prevent future damage
This Intensive Repair Shampoo was formulated with Nutri-Keratin Repair Actives, which work immediately to help repair the hair surface
Wash after wash, this shampoo makes hair more healthy-looking and with continuous use, it helps protect hair against future damage
This shampoo for damaged hair is suitable for daily use, so your hair looks healthy, strong and more beautiful every day
For best results, follow with Dove Intensive Repair Conditioner to prevent breakages, and have instantly nourished, healthy-looking hair





How to use
Completely soak your hair and massage your Intensive Repair Shampoo gently over your scalp. Rinse it out well



Ingredients
Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Glycol Distearate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Acrylates/Beheneth-25 Methacrylate Copolymer, Amodimethicone, Cetrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid, Cocamide MEA, Dimethicone, Dimethiconol, Dimethyl Palmitamine, Disodium EDTA, Gluconolactone, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Laureth-23, Laureth-4, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Mica, Parfum, PEG-4, PEG-45M, Poloxamer 407, PPG-12, Silica, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sulfate, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, TEA-Sulfate, Trehalose, Trideceth-12, Xanthan Gum, Benzyl Alcohol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 77891.

name: Seek Anti-Dandruff
description:
Product details
		



This shampoo cleanses while infusing hair with intense moisture and shine-enhancing nutrients. Mafura Oil, Baobab, and Fair Trade Shea Butter are blended into a rich formulation of restorative oils to soften and revitalize hair.
 
Our shampoo, with antioxidant rich Fig, helps boost hydration while cleansing hair. Apply to wet hair and gently work into a rich lather. Rinse thoroughly. Repeat as needed. For best results, follow with our INTENSIVE HYDRATION CONDITIONER.
 
Shea Moisture's Story: Shea Moisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker, a pioneering mother of four and an entrepreneur, who sold Shea Butter, African Black Soap and homemade beauty preparations in Sierra Leone in 1912. We honor her vision by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa. With every purchase you show support of our mission to reinvest back in our communities.
 
Key features:

This range is great for dry, damaged coily hair
Designed to clean well but leave plenty of moisture for after-shampoo manageability
Mafura Oil, Baobab, and Fair Trade Shea Butter are blended into a rich formulation of restorative oils and anti-oxydant rich Fig
All Shea Moisture hair products contain fair trade shea butter from Ghana
This range is Sulphate and Silicone Free
With every purchase you show support of our mission to reinvest back in our communities

 
Natural ingredients may vary in color and consistency.




How to use
Work conditioner through clean, wet hair from roots to ends. Leave on for up to 3 minutes, then rinse. Style as desired. For best results use after cleansing with our HYDRATE & REPAIR SHAMPOO.

name: Seek Matt
description:
Product details
		



This gentle dry shampoo cleans and volumises hair in just 2 minutes. Formulated with a unique combination of highly absorbent powders and gentle Oat Milk, which is rich in active ingredients that provide moisturising, softening and protective properties. Perfect for all hair types trying to increase time between washes.
92% felt hair was clean in less than 5 minutes*
94% felt hair had more volume**
* Usage test. 67 females, 5 days of use.
** Test of tolerance. 31 subjects under dermatological control 
• Ultra gentle dry shampoo, cleans and volumises
 • Vegan
• Dermatologically tested
• Saves water* dry formula, cleans without water. 
• Protects water: Klorane Botanical Foundation is committed to protect water and fight against soil drought.
• Made in France
Oat, a perennial plant, traditionally used for its softening and protecting properties. We have chosen to grow a spring species called Avena Sativa L., for its high content in glucids, lipids and vitamins. We harvest it from our own fields according to Organic Agriculture Standards. Only mature Oat seeds are collected, separated and dried. We then extract the milk, rich in active ingredients, to incorporate its moisturising, softening and protective properties into this dry shampoo.
For over 25 years, Klorane has been committed to the Klorane Botanical Foundation, which fosters a passion for botany and is commited to preserving and promoting plant heritage protection by sharing botanical knowledge around the world. The Foundation takes its commitment into the field through 3 essential missions: 

PROTECT plant species under threat
EXPLORE the treasures of the plant world to better understand and protect them
SHARE our botanical knowledge with the largest number of people, particularly children




How to use
1. Shake
2. Spray section by section (15cm)
3. Leave on (2 minutes)
4. Brush thoroughly


Important info
France


Ingredients
BUTANE. PROPANE. ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) STARCH (ORYZASATIVA STARCH). ISOBUTANE. ALCOHOL (ALCOHOL DENAT). ALUMINUM STARCH OCTENYLSUCCINATE. AVENA SATIVA (OAT) KERNEL OIL (AVENA SATIVA KERNEL OIL). CETRIMONIUM CHLORIDE. CYCLODEXTRIN. FRAGRANCE (PARFUM). ISOPROPYL MYRISTATE. SILICA

description:

Tresemme Keratin Smooth Shampoo 100ml




How to use
Beautifully smooth hair starts with gentle cleansing. Apply a generous dose of TRESemmé Keratin Shampoo to wet hair. description:
Product details
		



Pantene Roots Awakener Hair Treatment With Caffeine 100ml

Introducing Pantene Pro-v Miracles, our highly nutritious Pro-V blends for hair that needs a miracle! The Roots Awakener is a hair fortifying treatment, that helps provide strength & thickness to each individual hair strand. This unique potent blend that combines Pro-V science with biotin, bamboo, caffeine, vitamin B3 and panthenol, penetrates deep in to the hair, to strengthen the roots. It will create the optimal environment for growth, so that you start noticing visible results as of the 1st use. It is easy to apply and dries quickly.This formula with highly nutritious Pro-V blends, is Tested by the Swiss Vitamin Institute.

Key Features



The Roots Awakener is a hair fortifying treatment, that helps provide strength & thickness to each individual hair strand
This unique potent blend that combines Pro-V science with biotin, bamboo, caffeine, vitamin B3 and panthenol, penetrates deep in to the hair, to strengthen the roots
It will create the optimal environment for growth, so that you start noticing visible results as of the 1st use
It is easy to apply and dries quickly
Pantene is the Swiss born, vitamin infused, worlds number 1 hair care range







How to use
Step 1: PartWhile standing in front of a mirror, part your hair with a comb, your fingers or the spray nozzle itself.Step 2: SpraySpray the product as closely as possible to the part line with the spray nozzle. Spray 3 times along each part line. Be sure to push down the spray nozzle completely each time you spray.Step 3: RepeatRepeat steps 1 and 2 five times so that you cover most of your scalp. You will need approximately 15 full pumps to cover scalp area above your ear line.Step 4: MassageGently massage the product around your scalp with your fingertips for about a minute to help spread the product around evenly.Step 5: StyleStyle your hair as you normally would. For even better results, blow dry directly into the root of your hair. Start with the root and blow the air directly toward the scalp. Blow dry the hair against the direction it will lay.


Hazards and Cautions
Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.

name: Storm Spike
description:
Product details
		



Naturally Refreshed Hair with 100% natural bamboo fibre & gardenia extracts. Gives an extra lift for fine hair.
Harness the power of mother nature with this plant-powered dry shampoo. Give hair a spritz between washes to gently remove excess oil and instantly restore movement. And the bonus? This can uses 40%* less packaging, meaning that you lower your environmental impact and look fabulous doing it.




How to use
FEEL FABULOUS IN 4
1 Shake for a few seconds to wake the magic
2 Section hair and spray towards your roots (from 30cm to be exact)
3 Tumble around with your fingertips and add a little head massage to ensure roots are covered
4. Brush lightly to remove excess residue. You’re ready for the world



Hazards and Cautions
CAUTION: Use in a well-ventilated space and avoid direct inhalation. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating or inhaling the contents can be harmful or fatal. Avoid spraying in eyes. Do not apply to broken or irritated skin. Discontinue use if skin / scalp rash or irritation occurs. Seek medical attention if skin / scalp rash or irritation persists. Use only as directed. Not for intimate hygiene use.
DANGER: Extremely flammable aerosol. Pressurised container: May burst if heated. Keep away from heat, hot surfaces, sparks, open flames and other ignition sources. No smoking. Do not spray on an open flame or other ignition source. Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50°C / 122°F. 
KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN

Vegan Friendly
Invisible Finish
Natural Cleaning Power
Delicate Scent 
No Water Needed
Natural Extracts 
Recyclable Pack

name: Storm Zesty
description:
Product details
		



COLAB™ is an award-winning dry shampoo that’s perfect for all hair types, colours and textures.
 
Our incredible formula effectively absorbs oil and instantly refreshes roots with an invisible*, lightweight finish. Hair feels clean, soft and beautifully fragranced with notes of bergamot and rose.
*after brushing
Developed using a very fine starch, COLAB is known for its’ unique and revolutionary technical formula. This results in a totally weightless and magically invisible spray. 
 
This fabulous formula uses teeny tiny particles that, whilst absorbing excess oil and grease from the scalp mean that less product is sprayed onto the hair. 
 
Less product means absolutely no white residue. Hair is refreshed and revived instantly without the hairs’ natural body and bounce being compromised. Your natural hair glossiness shines through!
 
With COLAB, absolutely no water is needed, so it’s the perfect choice to freshen up hair quickly and on the go! Just spray, massage and style!
 
COLAB is proud to be totally cruelty free, against animal testing and a vegan friendly product.




Suitable for
COLAB can be used on all hair types, colours and textures. As well bleached and colour treated hair



How to use
COLAB dry shampoo is the ultimate quick fix. Just spray and brush through to leave your hair feeling instantly clean, soft and beautifully fragranced. PLUS, no white residue! Not even on dark hair.
 
For an instant hair refresh simply follow the steps below:
Step 1. Shake well.  Section dry hair & spray into the roots from around 20cm/8"
Step 2. Massage with fingertips and then brush through
Step 3. Tease to a perfect style with a sheer invisible finish & a gorgeous veil of fragrance



Hazards and Cautions
DANGER. EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE AEROSOL.
Pressurised container: may burst if heated. Keep away from heat, hot surfaces, sparks, open flames and other ignition sources. No smoking. Do not spray on an open flame or other ignition source. Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50°C/122°F. Keep out of reach of children. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal. Avoid spraying towards the eyes, or on damaged or inflamed skin.



Important info

Amazing oil absorption
Invisible finish
No white residue
Undetectable in the hair
Weightless
Country of origin: UK
SLG Brands Ltd. GL50 3FF, UK.
SLG Brands (Europe) Ltd. D18 NW62, Ireland.

name: Sub-Sahara Nourishing
description:
Product details
		



There’s something about deeply cleansed, purified and hydrated hair that lets you take on the day with confidence. You can now get that style without having to go to a salon with Tresemme Hydrate & Purify Shampoo for greasy hair. Featuring hyaluronic acid and white clay, this clarifying shampoo is designed to both deeply cleanse and lock in moisture, leaving hair feeling fresh and hydrated. Its professional-quality formula uses our PRO Style Technology with amino acids and ceramides to leave your hair strong and manageable with continuous use. To take action against greasy hair, start your routine by applying a generous amount of Tresemme Hydrate & Purify Shampoo to wet hair. Gently massage the scalp with your fingertips to work into a lather, then rinse thoroughly. Follow with Hydrate & Purify Conditioner, and style with your favourite Tresemme styling products as needed.
 
At Tresemme, we’ve always understood that style is more than a look: it’s a part of you. With our professional-quality care, a world of style possibilities is yours to achieve. Every choice we make at Tresemme, from the values we promote – such as not testing on animals and being PETA approved – to the stylists we work with, right down to the carefully selected ingredients we use, are made with intention and inspired by the latest trends and style. Because 70 years on, we believe in the power of style. So tell your story, land that job, make your mark – and achieve your aspirations with confidence. With Tresemme, your style can match your ambition.

 
Key features:

• Tresemme Hydrate & Purify Shampoo deeply cleanses greasy hair, leaving it fresh and hydrated
• This cleansing shampoo for greasy hair features PRO Style Technology which works from the inside out to leave hair strong and manageable with continued use
• Formulated with hyaluronic acid and white clay, our clarifying shampoo purifies hair whilst locking in moisture, leaving your hair beautifully cleansed and revived
• Our hair care experts are at the forefront of science and safety – every ingredient is carefully selected to ensure your hair receives the best possible care
• Apply Tresemme Hydrate & Purify Shampoo from roots to ends, lather gently while massaging the scalp, and rinse thoroughly; follow with Hydrate & Purify Conditioner to maximise results
• With Tresemme professional hair care products, you can create your personal style to achieve your aspirations with confidence




Ingredients
Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Glycerin, Carbomer, Glycol Distearate, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Cocamide MEA, Polyquaternium-10, Kaolin, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Arginine, Lysine HCl, Ceramide NG, Sodium Hydroxide, PPG-6, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Geraniol, Limonene
